```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library('ggplot2')
library('extrafont')
```

```{r generate ideal points, fig.width = 7, fig.height = 3}
set.seed(683693)
N <- 5 # 1 dictator + 9 communities
utility <- function(idealpoint, range = c(-1, 11)){
  x_sequence <- seq(min(range), max(range), length.out = 100)
  utility <- -1/4 * (x_sequence - idealpoint)^2
  out <- cbind(x_sequence, utility)
  lines(out[, 1], out[, 2])
  # return(out)
}

idealpoints <- c(1, 3 + (10 - 3) * runif(N-1))
{
  plot(idealpoints, rep(0, N), type = 'n', 
    xlim = c(-1,11), ylim = c(-.5, .1),
    bty = 'n', xaxt = 'n', yaxt = 'n', ylab = 'Nutzen', xlab = 'Politikraum')
  abline(h = 0)
  for(i in idealpoints){ utility(i) }
  points(idealpoints, rep(0, N), pch = 19)
  text(x = idealpoints[1], 0, labels = "D", pos = 3)
}
```
